item.description:
Hello,
I just got back from a week retreat in Colorado, it really is very beautiful there.

I look forward to seeing all of you at our next meditation meet up: OCTOBER 30th at 7:30pm.

Here is what we will do....
1. have some tea.
2. Practice a deep breathing technique
3. Go through a full guided mediation to relax the body
4. I will read something from Thich Nhat Hanh's book, peace is every step. We will meditate on that message.
5.We can share a little and then
6. Say good bye.

Hope to see you there,
Happy meditating,
Rev Gabrielle

It will be about 1 hour and 15 minutes including everything.
item.name: Meditation meet up rescheduled
